npm-test

Test a package

SYNOPSIS

  npm test <name>
  npm tst <name>

DESCRIPTION

This runs a package's "test" script, if one was provided.

To run tests as a condition of installation, set the npat config to true.

SEE ALSO

  • npm-run-script(1)
  • npm-scripts(7)
  • npm-start(1)
  • npm-restart(1)
  • npm-stop(1)

npm-test — npm@2.0.0
